name: .ACD-ZIP File Extension
type_name: Sony ACID Project With Embedded Media File
summary: Learn about .ACD-ZIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Audio project created by Sony ACID Xpress, MAGIX ACID Music Studio, or MAGIX ACID Pro; saved in a .ZIP format and contains an .ACD project file as well as the music compilation audio files; differs from an ACD file, which only stores references to the audio files.

content: ACD-ZIP files are used for saving and loading audio projects and all related asset files. Since they are stored in a Zip format, you can view the compressed files manually by renaming the extension to ".zip" and opening the file with a Zip utility.
NOTE: ACID Music Studio and Pro were developed by Sony, but were acquired by MAGIX in 2016.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
